nome: Yarinaoshi Reijou wa Ryuutei Heika wo Kouryakuchuu

episodios.nome: I Tried to Avoid the Route to Destruction and Somehow Ended Up Courting My Greatest Enemy
I Already Know the Tragedy That Is to Come, So I Will Do What I Can to Avoid It
The Situation Is Desperate, but as the God of War's Daughter, I Will Defeat the Enemy with Brute Strength
My Fiancé Is Trying His Best to Woo Me and I Don't Know What to Do About It
When Seeking the Truth, Things Turned Into an Argument, So I Can No Longer Do Anything
Upstarts Are Attempting to Get Close to My Fiance and I Want to Beat Them at Their Own Game
I Want to Stop Living the Slow Life, So I Have Decided to Start in the Dragon Knights
I, the Dragon Consort, Am Now Hated by the Dragon and I Want to Find a Way to Be Friendly Again
My Fiancé and I Nearly Ripped Each Other to Shreds and It May Still End Up Being a Bloodbath
As a Result of Doing-over My Life, I Find Myself Out of Options Once Again
My Fiancé's Uncle Is Behaving So Outrageously That I Can No Longer Stand Silently By
The Do-Over Damsel Conquers the Dragon Emperor

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: Yarinaoshi Reijou wa Ryuutei Heika wo Kouryakuchuu
metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: The Do-Over Damsel Conquers The Dragon Emperor
metadata_completo.sinopse:
Jill Savelle—fiancée of the crown prince Gerald der Kratos and known as the "Lady Goddess of War"—is being hunted down by the same country she swore to protect. Betrayed by her betrothed, she is framed as a traitor and imprisoned. In her last moments, Jill is filled with regret, but just as death approaches, she awakens six years in the past. This time, she will not be a mere pawn.

Now as a 10-year-old girl, Jill resolves to escape her imminent engagement to the prince. To this end, she jokingly professes her love to the 19-year-old dragon emperor Hadis Teos Rave, who will one day stain the land in blood due to madness. But against all expectations, he accepts!

In contrast to the tyrant from Jill's memories, the Hadis of this time is a kind albeit unfortunate emperor. Can Jill prevent Hadis from descending down the same dark, villainous road, or is he bound to an inevitable future?

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
